Exploring GPT-RAG: Sharing the learning along the way we been gathering to enable Azure OpenAI at enterprise scale in a secure manner. GPT-RAG core is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pattern running in Azure, using Azure Cognitive Search for retrieval and Azure OpenAI large language models to power ChatGPT-style and Q&A experiences.
